title: Castle Mountains National Monument: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved        NPS Centennial 2016 is the 100th birthday of the National Park Service. We're challenging you to Find Your Park in one of the more than 400 national park units around the country. Learn more and find out how to share your own experiences. Artist in Residence Participants in neighboring Mojave National Preserve's Artist in Residence program find inspiration to forge a better understanding and dialogue about our national parks, desert landscapes, and the relationship between wildlands and the human spirit.
